ygData.messageBody:
Enchanters also get invis to undead (along with regular invis).

-----Message d'origine-----
De: Wayne Sheppard [mailto:mrwayne@...]
Date: mardi 11 janvier 2000 11:45
´┐¢: eqbards@onelist.com
Objet: Re: [eqbards] Digest Number 649


From: "Wayne Sheppard" <mrwayne@...>

> From: "Andrew Simpson" <hornsfan@...>
> Subject: Re: Invis to undead
>
> >From: "Wayne Sheppard" <mrwayne@...>
>
>
> >Necros get Invisibility to Undead at level 1.
> >
>
> Unless twinked though, I don't think they have the mana to cast it at
level
> 1. My dark elf necro with 114 INT didn't have the mana to cast it at
least.

Correct, it is a 40 mana spell. At 2nd level you will have enough mana to
cast it. Clerics, Paladins, Shadowknights and Necros have Invisibility to
Undead.

Bards get Sonorous Clouding which will work against Undeads as well.


Wayne
